name: Abraham Lincoln
what_did:
Lincoln was the 16th president of the United States.
He led the country during the Civil War and helped end slavery.
He gave the famous Gettysburg Address and was known for his honesty.
why_matters:
Lincoln helped unite a divided country and made sure all people could be free.
He is remembered as one of America’s greatest presidents.
His leadership helped shape the nation.
